dcterms:description: A dataset containing simulated DNA reads generated by the Mason_simulator from three virus genomes: adenovirus, SARS-CoV-2, and SARS.
dcterms:title: ReadsOriginal

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 2000 Adeno reads, 2000 COVID reads, and 2000 SARS reads, all of length 101, generated by the Mason_simulator.
dcterms:title: ReadsNew

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 6000 Mason_simulator-generated reads of length 100 from an E. coli genome.
dcterms:title: ReadsEcoli

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 6000 random sequences of length 101 generated from {A, C, G, T}, representing pure noise.
dcterms:title: Random6K

dcterms:description: A dataset combining the original dataset and 2000 elements of ReadsEcoli, representing a situation the classiﬁer is not prepared for: the presence of a fourth source of reads.
dcterms:title: ReadsMixed1

dcterms:description: A dataset combining the original dataset and 100 elements of ReadsEcoli, representing an alternative situation the classiﬁer is not prepared for: contamination from a fourth source of reads.
dcterms:title: ReadsMixed2
